location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 29 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the commands of the Bombay Government (No 652 of 1822), which instructed the Resident to mediate between the Shaikh of Bahrain and Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd, the Imam of Muscat. It notes that the Resident should not offer any guarantees from the British Government concerning the dispute.
